commands.name: az devcenter admin plan-member create
commands.summary: Create a dev center plan member resource.
commands.syntax:
az devcenter admin plan-member create --member-id
                                      --member-name
                                      --member-type {Group, User}
                                      --plan-name
                                      --resource-group
                                      [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                      [--tags]
                                      [--tier]
examples: az devcenter admin plan-member create --name "d702f662-b3f2-4796-9e8c-13c22378ced3" --plan-name "ContosoPlan" --resource-group "rg1" --tags CostCode="12345" --member-id "d702f662-b3f2-4796-9e8c-13c22378ced3" --member-type "User"

az devcenter admin plan-member create --name "d702f662-b3f2-4796-9e8c-13c22378ced3" --plan-name "ContosoPlan" --resource-group "rg1" --tags CostCode="12345" --member-id "d702f662-b3f2-4796-9e8c-13c22378ced3" --member-type "Group"

commands.name: az devcenter admin plan-member delete
commands.summary: Delete a dev center plan member.
commands.syntax:
az devcenter admin plan-member delete [--ids]
                                      [--member-name]
                                      [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                      [--plan-name]
                                      [--resource-group]
                                      [--subscription]
                                      [--yes]

commands.name: az devcenter admin plan-member list
commands.summary: List all of the members assigned to a devcenter plan.

commands.name: az devcenter admin plan-member update
commands.summary: Update a devcenter plan member resource.
commands.syntax:
az devcenter admin plan-member update [--add]
                                      [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                      [--ids]
                                      [--member-id]
                                      [--member-name]
                                      [--member-type {Group, User}]
                                      [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                      [--plan-name]
                                      [--remove]
                                      [--resource-group]
                                      [--set]
                                      [--subscription]
                                      [--tags]
                                      [--tier]
examples: az devcenter admin plan-member update --name "d702f662-b3f2-4796-9e8c-13c22378ced3" --plan-name "ContosoPlan" --resource-group "rg1" --tags CostCode="12345"

commands.name: az devcenter admin plan-member wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
